steps.name: Given I navigate to the PerfectDraft website
Given I am on the UK website
When I navigate to the "Beer Kegs" section
Then I should see a list of available beer kegs
Then each keg should display:
steps.statusMessage: Expected displayRequiredInfo to be true because Each keg should display the required product information including:, but found False.
